name: Gregory's Christmas Adventure
description:
Gregory's Christmas Adventure 

Once upon a time, there was a town covered in a white blanket of snow. On almost every porch stood a snowman, made by happy children the day before. Lights covered the houses and through the windows you could see Christmas trees in every living room. This town truly had the Christmas spirit, which was good because that day it was Christmas eve. Children were already put to bed and dreaming about reindeers and sleigh bells and one particular man in red. Gregory was also in bed, but not dreaming at all. He was thinking of those reindeers and sleigh bells and. Wait, he could hear them! He could hear the bells. That must be Santa Claus flying over the town.

Controls

  • A = walk to the left
  • D = walk to the right
  • E = interaction
  • W = jump
  • ESC = exit game

This game was made by five Communication & Multimedia students in Leeuwarden, The Netherlands. We have decided to team up during our minor Game Development & 3D for our very first game jam!
